sentences.en: Appropriate and thoughtful self assertion unlocks talent, setting achievement in motion.
sentences.cn: 适当和周到的自我主张解锁人才, 设置运动的成就.

sentences.en: He attempts to rebut the assertion made by the prosecution witness.
sentences.cn: 他试图反驳原告方证人所作的断言.

sentences.en: He said with a strange, almost rough sweetness of assertion.
sentences.cn: 他断言的语调很奇特, 差不多是粗暴,但又不无深情.

sentences.en: He was correct in his assertion that the minister had been lying.
sentences.cn: 他认定部长说谎，事实果然如此。

sentences.en: Our assertion that the interstellar gas is definitely no vacuum would seem all the more paradoxical!
sentences.cn: 我们坚持星际气体决非真空的主张看来愈发荒谬可笑了!

sentences.en: Self-assertion was not thought seemly in a woman.
sentences.cn: 人们认为女性不应该过于自信。

sentences.en: She makes very general assertions about marriage in the poem.
sentences.cn: 她在诗中的婚姻主张非常笼统。

sentences.en: The assertion is known as the closed graph theorem for Hilbert spaces.
sentences.cn: 这个断语被称为希耳伯特空间的闭图象定理.

sentences.en: The character used to denote an end of line assertion.
sentences.cn: 用于判断行结束的字符.

sentences.en: The decision is seen as an assertion of his authority within the company.
sentences.cn: 这个决定被看作是他在公司内部对自己权威的维护。

sentences.en: The utterance functions of the modifiers include referent and assertion.
sentences.cn: 修饰语的表述功能包括指称和陈述.

sentences.en: This assertion rests on a misunderstanding.
sentences.cn: 这种断言是由一种误解而来.

sentences.en: This assertion, as we shall see in the next chapter, is certainly erroneous.
sentences.cn: 这种论调, 我们将在下章内看到, 实在是错误的.

sentences.en: This dark assertion will be illuminated later on.
sentences.cn: 这句晦涩的话,下文将有所交待.

sentences.en: This extraordinary assertion was greeted with a roar of merriment.
sentences.cn: 这个奇怪的论断引起了欢声大笑.

sentences.en: With this assertion of her dignity she bade her parents farewell.
sentences.cn: 她这么大模大样地说了以后,就对她父母告辞了.

断言，声明；主张，要求；坚持
